title: Reward for a Little Demon
detail_text: <:th_ch0001/>Alright, we’re here! This is where you want to go, right? Wow~, I didn’t know there’s a place like this in Tokyo.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Heh.... There are simply places you can’t find without magical powers. One of which would be here, the fountain of magic....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Eh? Didn’t the sign in the park say it was a pond?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Po-.... It’s better to let normal humans think it’s a pond. If they find out that this is a source of magical energy, they will panic, won’t they?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Hmm, I see.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Honoka, I shall reward you for taking me here and being an excellent little demon. Here, some bread. Take it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Eh, bread!? Yaaay~! ....Wait, Yoshiko-chan!? I-, isn’t this bread the one where you have to line up for at least 30 minutes even if you go at their opening time!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Eh? Well, I did line up, but.... Wait, it’s not Yoshiko, it’s Yohane! Just take it, would you?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Aaaah! I love you, Yoshiko-chan!! I’ll take you anywhere you want, so just invite me again sometimes, okay~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Like I said, it’s not Yoshi-.... Hey! Stop clinging to me! It’s embarrassing!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
